Title: Reckoning (2)
Plot: The fate of the galaxy hangs in the balance as Sam and Jacob search for the only weapon capable of stopping the Replicator onslaught. O'Neill leads a defense of the S.G.C., while Daniel squares off against Replicator Carter.
GuestStars: Amanda Tapping, Jeff Judge, Dean Aylesworth, Carmen Argenziano, Isaac Hayes, Eric Breker, Gary Jones
